verses.verse: In the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> of the month, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> you, <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8577>monster<s%> that <S%H7257>lies<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of his <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> That has <S%H559>said,<s%> 'My <S%H2975>Nile<s%> is mine, and I <S%H589>myself<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> it.'

"And I shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> in your <S%H3895>jaws,<s%> And I shall make the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of your <S%H2975>rivers<s%> <S%H1692>cling<s%> to your <S%H7193>scales.<s%> And I shall <S%H5927>bring<s%> you up out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of your <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of your <S%H2975>rivers<s%> will <S%H1692>cling<s%> to your <S%H7193>scales.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H5203>abandon<s%> you to the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> you and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of your <S%H2975>rivers;<s%> You will <S%H5307>fall<s%> on the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field;<s%> you will not be <S%H622>brought<s%> <S%H622>together<s%> or <S%H6908>gathered.<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you for <S%H402>food<s%> to the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>

"Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> they have <S%H1961>been<s%> [only] a <S%H4938>staff<s%> [made] of <S%H7070>reed<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"When they <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H8610>hold<s%> of you with the <S%H3709>hand,<s%> You <S%H7533>broke<s%> and <S%H1234>tore<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3802>hands;<s%> And when they <S%H8172>leaned<s%> on you, You <S%H7665>broke<s%> and made <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H5975>quake.<s%>"

<S%H3651>'Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> upon you a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and I shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from you <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%>

"And the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and <S%H2723>waste.<s%> Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you <S%H559>said,<s%> 'The <S%H2975>Nile<s%> is mine, and I have <S%H6213>made<s%> [it,]'

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you and <S%H413>against<s%> your <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> an <S%H9165>utter<s%> <S%H9165>waste<s%> and <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> from <S%H4024>Migdol<s%> [to] <S%H5482>Syene<s%> and even to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia.<s%>

"A man's <S%H7272>foot<s%> will not <S%H5674>pass<s%> through it, and the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of a <S%H929>beast<s%> will not <S%H5674>pass<s%> through it, and it will not be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> for <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

"So I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H8074>desolated<s%> <S%H776>lands.<s%> And her <S%H5892>cities,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H2717>laid<s%> <S%H2117>waste,<s%> will be <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and I shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them among the <S%H776>lands.<s%>"

'For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> I shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> among <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they were <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and shall <S%H7725>make<s%> them <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4351>origin;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they will be a <S%H8217>lowly<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

"It will be the <S%H8217>lowest<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%> and it will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> itself up <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> And I shall <S%H4591>make<s%> them so <S%H4591>small<s%> that they will not <S%H7287>rule<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

"And it will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> be the <S%H4009>confidence<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2142>bringing<s%> to <S%H2142>mind<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their having <S%H6437>turned<s%> to Egypt. Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>"' "

Now in the twenty-seventh <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H259>first<s%> of the month, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made his <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H5656>labor<s%> <S%H1419>hard<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> was <S%H7139>made<s%> <S%H7139>bald,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> was <S%H4803>rubbed<s%> <S%H4803>bare.<s%> But he and his <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7939>wages<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> for the <S%H5656>labor<s%> that he had <S%H5647>performed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it."

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%> And he will <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H5375>off<s%> her <S%H1995>wealth,<s%> and <S%H7997>capture<s%> her <S%H7998>spoil<s%> and <S%H962>seize<s%> her <S%H957>plunder;<s%> and it will be <S%H7939>wages<s%> for his <S%H2428>army.<s%>

"I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> [for] his <S%H6468>labor<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5647>performed,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H6213>acted<s%> for Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"On that <S%H3117>day<s%> I shall make a <S%H7161>horn<s%> <S%H6779>sprout<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I shall <S%H5414>open<s%> <S%H6610><s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst.<s%> Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
